events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for money back.
Support agent Jessica has been assigned to handle this refund request for the customer.
Hello! I’m Jessica and I’ll be assisting you with your refund request today. Could you please provide the order number?
In order to process your refund, please share a photo of the item you received along with your order confirmation.
Here is the photo of the wrong product I got, plus the order number is 879654321. I’m quite disappointed about this.
Thank you for providing the details. We have initiated your refund, and you should see the amount credited back to your payment method within 5 to 7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and action. I appreciate your help in resolving this issue promptly.
The refund process is complete from our side. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund successfully. Feel free to reach out if there are any other concerns.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support, and have a great day!
